rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. For each pair of digits (X and Y) outside the grid, either X is in the Yth position in that direction or Y is in the Xth position in that direction or both.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. For each pair of digits (X and Y) outside the grid, either X is in the Yth position in that direction or Y is in the Xth position in that direction or both.
